dt: {bc}a person who hates someone or something

dt.t: Instrumental in the growing anti-disco movement was Steve Dahl, a Chicago disc jockey and fervent disco {wi}hater{/wi} …
His vision of the computerized society becomes astoundingly apocalyptic, and even the most confirmed {wi}hater{/wi} of bits and bytes will find some of his fears hard to take seriously.
Storm … might seem to provide ammunition to those who see Strindberg as a woman-{wi}hater{/wi}.

dt: {bc}a person who actively and aggressively criticizes and disparages something or someone (such as a celebrity or public figure)

dt.t: … throughout the campaign has demonstrated that he not only doesn't mind yapping with {wi}haters{/wi} and detractors but actually seems to enjoy it.
There are a lot of {wi}haters{/wi} out there who want you to screw up, so you have to check yourself.
Chrissy Teigen is no stranger to getting attacked on Twitter. She also knows how to deal with her {wi}haters{/wi} in the perfect way.

shortdef: a person who hates someone or something —sometimes used in combination
a person who actively and aggressively criticizes and disparages something or someone (such as a celebrity or public figure)
